title: Olympics
text:
Data for this analysis was accessed from https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2021/2021-07-27 . Data was scraped from www.sports-reference.com in May 2018 and contains historical Olympics data from Athens 1896 to Rio 2016.

library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
olympics <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-07-27/olympics.csv')


ggplot(olympics, aes(x=year, y=age))+
  geom_point(aes(color=sex))+
  theme_minimal()









ggplot(olympics, aes(x=age))+
  geom_histogram(aes(fill=sex))+
  theme_minimal()









olympics_nona <- olympics[!is.na(olympics$age), ]
olympics_meanage<-olympics_nona%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  summarize(avg_age=(mean(age)))


ggplot(olympics_meanage, aes(x=year, y=avg_age)) +
  geom_point(shape=16, size=2, color="goldenrod4") +
  geom_smooth(color="#90EE90", fill="#90EE90", se=FALSE)+
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(title = "Mean Age of Athletes at the Olympics",
       subtitle = "1896 to 2016",
       x="Olympic Year",
       y="Mean Age")

title: Premier League Soccer
text:
The data for this analysis was accessed via https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2023/2023-04-04 . The data is from the Premier League Match Data 2021-2022 via Evan Gower on Kaggle. The dataset contains information about soccer matches in the 2021-2022 English Premier League season.

library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
soccer <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-04-04/soccer21-22.csv')


soccer_summary<-soccer%>%
  group_by(HomeTeam)%>%
  summarize(totalfouls=sum(HF))%>%
  arrange(desc(totalfouls))


plot<-ggplot(soccer_summary, aes(x=reorder(HomeTeam, totalfouls), y=totalfouls))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", aes(fill = ifelse(HomeTeam %in% c("Burnley", "Norwich", "Watford"), "Relegated", "Safe"))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Relegated" = "navyblue", "Safe" = "lightblue")) +
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(title="Premier League Fouls by Team, 2021-2022",
       subtitle="Home Games",
       y="Total Number of Fouls",
       x="Team",
       fill="Relegation Status")
plot+coord_flip()









soccer_summary2<-soccer%>%
  group_by(AwayTeam)%>%
  summarize(totalfouls_a=sum(AF))%>%
  arrange(desc(totalfouls_a))


plot2<-ggplot(soccer_summary2, aes(x=reorder(AwayTeam, totalfouls_a), y=totalfouls_a))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", aes(fill = ifelse(AwayTeam %in% c("Burnley", "Norwich", "Watford"), "Relegated", "Safe"))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Relegated" = "red", "Safe" = "lightpink")) +
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(title="Premier League Fouls by Team, 2021-2022",
       subtitle="Away Games",
       y="Total Number of Fouls",
       x="Team",
       fill="Relegation Status")
plot2+coord_flip()
